name: WundaSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, what is the temperature in living room?”
”Alexa, make the living room warmer.”
”Alexa, set kitchen temperture to 24.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wunda smart provides more control than any other system on the market. Not only giving you complete room by room control, but also giving you accurate readings at all times. Our App and our system will give you control, convenience and comfort. Helping you managing your household energy usage and costs from wherever, whenever. And now for better interaction you can use your voice to control Wunda Smart.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Wunda account* and discover your rooms. Each room will be shown as a separate thermostat. Only the Owner Account* can be used to connect to your Wunda device. For further assistance, please refer to https://www.amazon.com/help/alexa/smarthome/add-device.

After connecting Alexa to your Wunda devcie in a few simple steps, just say commands** like:
- "Alexa, set living room to 24."
- "Alexa, make bedroom warmer."
- "Alexa, make restroom cooler."
- "Alexa, what is the temperature in the guest bedroom?"
- "Alexa, what is the kitchen set to?"

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
- Echo Devices, Fire TV, Fire Tablet

* In order for Alexa to connect to Wunda, you must use the Owner Account, i.e. the account that was created to first set up your Wunda Smart.
